About me

My name is Yuliia

Hello! My name is Yuliia and I enjoy translating designer ideas into reality and giving them life on the internet. I always feel myself as a tech girl. So, I finally get a chance to take up my technical career. I choose Front-End Web Development and started to learn it. I acquired the knowledge needed for starting out as a developer. But I don`t stop learning web and I extremely motivated to constantly develop my skills and grow professionally.

Skills

What I use in my work
HTML5
It is this one that makes it possible to create a website wireframe and the fifth version will allow me to create a more SEO-optimized structure of your product
CSS3
CSS is the language for describing the presentation of Web pages, including colors, layout, and fonts. It allows me to create great-looking web pages
JavaScript
GIT
A version control system records changes carried out to a file, or a set of files over time, and helps you to recall specific versions of the code later on when you need it.
JQUERY
This library allows me to speed up development process. So if needed I can use it instead of native JavaScript
GULP
A toolkit to automate & enhance my workflow.I use Gulp to optimize images before publishing to the site, convert sass code to css, reduce the size of the resulting stylesheets and scripts.
FIGMA
Figma is a modern, streamlined design tool, which I use to extract information about typography, colors, measurement and more
VSCODE
Visual Studio Code is my favourite code editor. It has a lot of extensions which allow me to enhance productivity
